member.name: M:AdvProg.MainWindow.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor MainWindow instantiates the main display, specifying Data Contexts (controllers) and preparing the user's settings

member.name: P:AdvProg.MainWindow.Search
member.summary: Search get and set methods for the help menu

member.name: P:AdvProg.MainWindow.SearchResults
member.summary: Method SearchResults returns an Enumerable of the filtered results from the SearchList

member.name: M:AdvProg.MainWindow.PrepSettings
member.summary: Method PrepSettings loads and establishes the user's settings from a saved file

members.member:
Method SettingsButton_Click opens the settings menu popup
information about the sender button event arguments

Method HelpButton_Click opens the help menu or closes it
information about the sender button event arguments

Method ShortCut_Click opens the relevant maths visualiser popup
information about the sender button event arguments

member.name: M:AdvProg.MainWindow.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Method OnPropertyChanged triggered when search help menu is changed

member.name: T:AdvProg.ViewModel
member.summary: Class ViewModel is used to control various elements of the GUI

members.member:
Method CountRichLines is used to count the number of lines the print will require
the string to be measured Number of lines

Method GetPriorChar returns the character in the textbox one index before the cursor.
the textbox to be addressed the current index of the cursor/selection

Method RemoveCurrentLineText removes the current entered line text in a given TextBox
the textbox that will be accessed

Method GetPrompt is used to get the current line code (which is always the final line)
the textbox to be accessed

Method PrintResults takes the input string and moves it to the PrintWindow along with the result
the result string to be printed the prompt which the user entered

Method PrintError is used when an error is printed, this is done in red with some formatting, thus very similar to PrintResult
the error message to be printed the prompt which the user entered

member.name: M:AdvProg.ViewModel.UpdateWorkstation
member.summary: Method UpdateWorkstation is used to synchronise the GUI workstation with the backend VariableStore

member.name: P:AdvProg.ViewModel.ReturnCommand
member.summary: Method ReturnCommand is used with the return keybind to send prompts to the backend

member.name: P:AdvProg.ViewModel.BackCommand
member.summary: Method BackCommand is used with the backspace keybind to handle character deletion. This ensures the user cannot delete previous prompts/move lines

member.name: P:AdvProg.ViewModel.LeftCommand
member.summary: Method LeftCommand is used with the left-arrow keybind to handle line-selection. This ensures the user cannot ascend/descend lines incorrectly.

member.name: P:AdvProg.ViewModel.DelVarCommand
member.summary: Method DelVarCommand is used to delete a variable from the Workstation and hence the VariableStore

member.name: P:AdvProg.ViewModel.UpHistoryCommand
member.summary: Method UpHistoryCommand is used with the up-arrow keybind to handle history viewing (ascends through the history array).

member.name: P:AdvProg.ViewModel.DownHistoryCommand
member.summary: Method DownHistoryCommand is used to descend through the history array using the down-arrow keybind.
